products.name: BTS Dynamite T-Shirt
products.description: Premium quality cotton T-shirt featuring your favorite K-pop idols. Perfect for concerts, fan meetings, or casual wear. Made with 100% organic cotton for ultimate comfort.
products.washingGuide: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low. Do not bleach. Iron on reverse side.

products.name: Blackpink Born Pink T-Shirt
products.description: Show your love for Blackpink with this premium T-shirt featuring the Born Pink design. Soft, comfortable, and perfect for any occasion.
products.washingGuide: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.

products.name: NewJeans Get Up T-Shirt
products.description: Fresh and trendy NewJeans design perfect for the modern K-pop fan. Comfortable fit and vibrant colors.
products.washingGuide: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.

products.name: LE SSERAFIM Unforgiven T-Shirt
products.description: Bold and powerful design featuring LE SSERAFIM. Perfect for fans who love their fierce style.
products.washingGuide: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.

feedbacks.comment: Amazing quality! The BTS shirt is so soft and the print is perfect. Shipping was super fast too!
Love the Blackpink design! Perfect fit and great material. Will definitely order again.
Great shirt! The NewJeans design is so cute. Only wish it came in more colors.
